mapper.select: SELECT YEAR ,SEMESTER ,DEPT ,GRADE ,DEPTNAME ,ENTR_AMT ,EDU_AMT ,STD_AMT1 ,STD_AMT2 ,STD_AMT3 ,HOUSE_AMT ,FOOD_AMT ,REMARK FROM ST_REGIST_AMT WHERE YEAR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ST_REGIST_AMT.year}, '%') AND SEMESTER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ST_REGIST_AMT.semester}, '%') ORDER BY YEAR, SEMESTER, DEPT, GRADE
